attributes.action: Immediately suspend all UK aid to Uganda
attributes.additional_details:
These values are under attack after MPs in Uganda passed a controversial anti-LGBT bill, which would make homosexual acts punishable by death. 

The bill introduces capital and life imprisonment sentences for gay sex and “recruitment, promotion and funding” of same-sex “activities”.
attributes.background: Uganda is a commonwealth country receiving more than £95m in aid annually. The Commonwealth is founded on certain values that include respect to individual rights.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635322
